executiveSummary.verdict: This application exhibits numerous characteristics of AI-generated design with minimal human refinement.
topIssues: üö® CRITICAL: Chaotic spacing system with 30+ unique values (should be 8-12)
üö® CRITICAL: No cohesive design system - colors, typography, shadows are inconsistent
üö® CRITICAL: Missing visual hierarchy and clear user intention on most screens
‚ö†Ô∏è HIGH: No microinteractions or polish - feels dead and unresponsive
‚ö†Ô∏è HIGH: Impersonal, robotic copy with no emotional connection
‚ö†Ô∏è HIGH: Inconsistent button styling and CTA hierarchy
‚ö†Ô∏è HIGH: Missing empty states, loading states, and error handling
‚ö†Ô∏è HIGH: Typography chaos with 10+ font sizes (should be 5-7)
‚ö†Ô∏è MEDIUM: Generic transitions and poor motion design
‚ö†Ô∏è MEDIUM: No spring animations or custom easing curves
reasonsLacksSoul: 1. ZERO PERSONALITY: Copy is impersonal and robotic. No "you/your" language.
2. DEAD INTERACTIONS: No hover effects, no transitions, no feedback.
3. VISUAL CHAOS: Random spacing, colors, shadows - no design system.
4. NO STORY: Screens feel like component dumps, not user journeys.
5. MISSING EDGE CASES: No empty states, loading states, or error guidance.
6. GENERIC EVERYTHING: Buttons say "Submit", charts look like library defaults.
7. NO RHYTHM: Elements placed randomly without visual flow.
8. LACKS TRUST: No elevation, poor contrast, unprofessional feel.
9. ROBOTIC MOTION: Instant jumps or slow sluggish animations.
10. NO CRAFT: Every detail screams "AI-generated, not human-refined".
topPriorities: 1. BUILD DESIGN SYSTEM: Define 8-12 spacing values, 5-7 font sizes, 10-15 colors
2. ADD MICROINTERACTIONS: Hover states, focus rings, button feedback
3. FIX TYPOGRAPHY: Reduce to 5-7 font sizes with clear hierarchy
4. IMPLEMENT MOTION: 200ms transitions with custom easing curves
5. ADD PERSONALITY: Rewrite copy with "you/your" language
6. CREATE EMPTY STATES: Design for zero-data scenarios
7. ADD LOADING STATES: Skeleton screens or spinners
8. FIX BUTTON HIERARCHY: 1 primary CTA per screen
9. IMPROVE SHADOWS: 3-5 elevation levels with consistent shadows
10. ADD VISUAL RHYTHM: Use consistent spacing and alignment

benchmarkComparison.linear: Linear has perfect spacing, clear hierarchy, spring animations. This has none.
benchmarkComparison.notion: Notion has personality, empty states, microinteractions. This feels dead.
benchmarkComparison.stripe: Stripe has trust, polish, professional shadows. This looks amateur.
benchmarkComparison.figma: Figma has craft, attention to detail, visual rhythm. This is chaos.

globalIssues.impact: Visual chaos, unprofessional appearance, hard to maintain
globalIssues.fix: Implement 4px/8px grid system with 8-12 spacing tokens

globalIssues.issue: 30+ unique colors with no semantic meaning
globalIssues.impact: Inconsistent brand, confusing UI, accessibility issues
globalIssues.fix: Define semantic color palette: primary, secondary, success, warning, error, neutral

globalIssues.impact: Poor readability, no visual structure, looks unprofessional
globalIssues.fix: Create type scale: 12, 14, 16, 18, 24, 32, 48px with clear usage

globalIssues.issue: 8+ shadow styles with no elevation system
globalIssues.impact: Inconsistent depth perception, looks flat or chaotic
globalIssues.fix: Define 3-5 elevation levels: sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl

globalIssues.impact: Feels robotic and AI-generated, poor UX
Looks like different apps stitched together
globalIssues.fix: Build component library with clear variants
Add subtle hover effects and focus rings to all interactive elements

globalIssues.issue: Missing empty states, loading states, errors
globalIssues.fix: Design and implement all edge case states

ux.why: User lands on page and has no idea what they're looking at. AI generates layouts without story.
ux.fix: Every screen needs clear H1 stating purpose

ux.why: Users see instant content jumps. Feels janky and AI-generated.
ux.fix: Add skeleton screens or spinners for async operations

ux.why: New users see broken UI. AI doesn't think about edge cases.
ux.fix: Design empty states with illustrations and clear CTAs

overall.why: Professional apps have strict design systems. This looks like components thrown together.
overall.fix: Build design system with tokens for spacing, colors, typography, shadows

overall.evidence: Elements don't follow consistent spacing/sizing patterns
overall.why: Human designers create visual rhythm. AI places elements randomly.
overall.fix: Use consistent spacing scale and alignment grid

overall.evidence: Buttons, inputs, cards lack hover/focus/active states
overall.why: Professional apps feel alive. This feels dead.
overall.fix: Add subtle hover effects, focus rings, active states

overall.evidence: Copy is impersonal, no empty states, no personality
overall.why: Users don't feel anything. AI doesn't understand emotion.
overall.fix: Add personality to copy, illustrations, empty states, success messages

quickWins.task: Add hover states to all buttons
quickWins.implementation: Add transition: all 200ms ease; and hover:opacity-90 to buttons
Replace "Submit" with specific actions like "Save Vehicle"
Add outline: 2px solid blue on focus
Create spinner component and show during async operations

mediumTerm.implementation: Define 8-12 spacing tokens (4, 8, 12, 16, 24, 32, 48, 64px) and refactor all spacing
Define semantic colors and replace all hardcoded values
Create Button, Input, Card, Modal components with variants
Design and implement empty states for all lists/collections
Define transition tokens and add to all interactive elements

longTerm.implementation: Build comprehensive design system with documentation
Hire copywriter or rewrite with conversational tone
Add custom illustrations for empty states, errors, success
Use react-spring or framer-motion for organic animations
Fix all WCAG issues, add ARIA labels, keyboard navigation

clarity: No clear primary CTA detected - user has no obvious next action
No clear page title (H1) - user doesn't know where they are
motion: No custom easing curves detected - motion feels robotic and AI-generated
No spring-based animations - lacks the organic feel of Linear/Notion
typography: 3 different font families. Professional apps use 1-2 max. This is a red flag.
emotionalSoul: No empty state handling detected - users will see broken UI
No loading states visible - users will see instant jumps (jarring)
No hover transitions detected - feels dead and unresponsive
